caption.title: List of parameters for the fully automated steps of FAST and their recommended values.

tr.td: Length of data segment to filter and snippet per block
To account for edge effects in filtering
Samples per spike snippet to record before and after peak (not including peak sample)
Threshold voltage below which the spike detection process is reset
Number of samples the recorded voltage must stay under the spike return threshold to reset the spike detection process
Number of spikes per block for local clustering
Range of temperatures for super-paramagnetic clustering (SPC)
Threshold for recursive merging of SPC tree (‘a’)
Threshold distance between leaf node and its parent node in the SPC tree below which the leaf node is merged with its parent.
Min. number of spikes in cluster to compute cluster centroid
Number of rounds of local clustering
Number of spike cluster centroids per block for generating SPC tree prior to segmentation fusion
Number of cluster trees per block for segmentation fusion
Number of cluster trees overlap between blocks for segmentation fusion
Parameters for sigmoid scaling of link weights to be between 0 and 1 in segmentation fusion
Similarity threshold for link weights between cluster trees in segmentation fusion
Link similarity threshold for straggler nodes
Similarity threshold for joining leftover nodes to an existing chain in segmentation fusion
